author: EdJenner
title: NBC News Busted Running Factually Dishonest Report About “Ghost Guns”
text:
Go to Article 
The liberal media has made it clear that they aren’t going to be honest when it comes to the gun control debate. In fact, they have made it clear they won’t even try to get the facts right. The latest example comes from NBC News and it was an absolute mess.
